messages.content: Hi, I'm having a really frustrating problem with my payment. I’ve been charged twice for my subscription, and it’s completely disrupting my workflow.
Hello! I understand this can be incredibly frustrating. I’m happy to help. Could you please provide me with your account details so I can look into this?
Sure, my account is under the name 'Alex Johnson' and my email is alex.johnson@example.com.

Thank you. Let me pull up your account. Okay, I see it here. You’ve been charged twice for your premium subscription – one charge on the 15th and another on the 22nd.  I’m so sorry for the inconvenience.  Let’s investigate this further.
I’ve already tried clearing my browser cache and cookies, but it doesn’t seem to be the issue.

Okay, I appreciate you trying those steps. Let’s see what we can do. I’ve just checked our payment processing logs and it appears there was a temporary spike in transactions around those dates. It seems there was a slight error in the system.  I’ve initiated a temporary credit to your account to cover the two charges.  It should reflect in your account within 24 hours.
That’s great, thank you so much! I really appreciate you resolving this quickly.
You’re very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
